Text: Gbʼo̩la o̩kpakpa, O Jihofa; nyʼukwa-mi eti!
Oji ajo̩-mi ku ma kpa ki kwʼugbo-we̩!
Uwe̩ fʼe̩do̩-mi jama me̩, uwe̩ lewa fʼomi go odu,
I chʼe-uko̩lo̩ amone̩, lugbo o̩la uko-we̩
U kwadʼe̩, todu uwe̩ adohi ñw mi, o O̩jo̩;
bʼame̩ne̩bibi ku ma akpa mi fo̩ te̩,
A ache kʼa lule̩, ma donyʼuwa daka;
I dab idu ki ache̩ño̩ e̩la kʼi akpaje̩,
Kwane̩, O Jihofa! gbʼo̩ oji, kʼe̩ mʼu du fiane̩!
nʼo̩wo̩-we̩ gba mi bʼamone̩ te̩, O Jihofa,
I chʼe-mi, nali eju-we̩ ef o̩kpakpa;
